FUNC.NAME: code39code32prefix
FUNC.SYNOPSIS: is used to set the Code39Code32prefix property which enables reporting of the Code32 prefix when a Code39 bar code is converted.

PARAM.NAME: code39code32prefix
PARAM.DESC: Enables/disables reporting the Code32 prefix when a Code39 bar code is converted.

EXAMPLE.DESC: The following example enables the scanner to read only Code39 labels with the code32Prefix property set to true:
EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="Code39:enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="Code39code32prefix:true"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner" Content="enabled">

EXAMPLE.DESC: Above example can also be written as shown below:

EXAMPLE.CODE: <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-Code39" Content="enabled"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-Code39code32prefix" Content="true"> <META HTTP-Equiv="scanner-enabled" Content="SCN1">

ADDITIONAL.APPLIES: Transient - Decoder settings are only guaranteed to persist until the Scanner is disabled
ADDITIONAL.REQ: Scanner or Imager module and device that supports Code39.
